gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 129, Pacers 120
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers held on to defeat the Pacers, 129-120. Donovan Mitchell led Cleveland with 33 points, four rebounds, and five assists while Jarrett Allen added 29 points and 13 rebounds on 13-14 shooting. Tyrese Haliburton (19 points, 12 assists) and Pascal Siakam (19 points) led Indiana in the loss. The Cavaliers officially clinched playoffs and will be no lower than a five-seed once they begin. Cleveland moves to 48-33 while Indiana drops to 46-35.
